sentence.Network_en: The Sioux had always fought other tribes for territorial rights.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏人总是为领地权与其他部落作战。

sentence.Network_en: The cavalry commander predicted that many Sioux would bite the dust if they attacked the fort.
sentence.Network_cn: 骑兵指挥官预言,如果苏族人进兵要塞,他们中有很多人会被打死.

sentence.Network_en: In the Midwest, Morningside College Sioux City, Iowa, has more than one thousand students.
sentence.Network_cn: 在中西部, 衣阿华州Sioux市的莫宁赛德学院, 拥有1, 000多名学生.
